resources.string: • Translation - Dutch translation was added. Thanks Kars & Silknl
• Improvement - Interact with heads up notifications, swipe to dismiss

• Improvement - Heads up notifications won\'t pop up when lock screen is active
• Bugfix - Large icons on the widget actionbar
• Bugfix - Transparent background on the widget

• Bugfix - Invisible preview when using hide on outside tap
• Bugfix - Duplicated notifications on ChompSMS
• Bugfix - Missing conversation on WhatsApp
• Improvement - Support transparency on widget background color
• Improvement - Clear the notification after using the quick reply

• Bug fix - First letter is missing on TouchDown email notifications
• Bug fix - Grouped mode doesn\'t work on Lollipop
• Bug fix - Widget actions appears cut on Lollipop
• Bug fix - Notifications wrong order on ChompSMS and some other apps

• New Feature - Quick Reply - Quickly reply a message without unlocking your phone on Hangouts, WhatsApp, ChompSMS and few other apps. (Requires Android 4.3+)
• New Notification Mode - Conversation Mode - Show notifications grouped by conversation for WhatsApp, Hangouts and few more apps. (Requires Android 4.3+)
• Improved Gmail support - Gmail notifications will now have full content and action buttons for each email. (Requires Android 4.3 and above)
• New Privacy Mode - No Interaction - Disable any available app actions (such as archive, reply) and quick reply for specific apps
• Translations - Added German, Spanish, French, Italian and Polish translations. Thanks to the community translators.
• Bug fixes: Swipe right to open, privacy on separated notifications, duplicated notifications, proximity sensor issues and many more

• Improved themes support - Supports the new Android L Theme and allow 3rd party themes to set a custom layout for the notification.
• Supports notifications with images.
• New option - Auto title color - set title color on notifications panel automatically using the app icon prominent color.
• New Feature - Heads Up (BETA) - display a top banner whenever a new notification arrives.
• Supports Android Wear - a new app specific option to repeat notifications into Android Wear device.
• Bug fixes

Huge update! so many improvements:

• NiLS FP has been integrated into NiLS Reduced memory usage and improved stability. Your settings and license will be automatically imported from NiLS Floating Panel. if it doesn\'t work, please contact support.
• New and improved appearance - access many options and settings easily using the new card base UI and the left navigation drawer.
• Supports ANY lock screen - NiLS now will be displayed on top of any lock screen, the lock screen will be automatically detected when the screen is turned on.
• New privacy options - you can control what information will be displayed for each app.
• Auto screen turn off - you can set screen off timeout option to turn off the screen few seconds after receiving a notification.
• Use any color - Use any color on NiLS widget text and background colors.
• Bug fixes - WhatsApp duplicates, CNBC notifications and many more bug fixes.

• Rearrange settings page. simplified access to many features.
• Notification mode - you choose between grouped and separated. (replaces \"Multiple Events Handling\" option)
• Notification icon - choose between original notification icon, app icon and status bar monochrome icon.
• Icon packs support - use almost any icon pack from Google Play instead of the standard notification icon.
• Choose whether to turn on screen on per app basis.
• Improved stability and memory usage.
• Forcibly turn off screen when timeout passes Requires \"Screen off (by KATECA)\" app to be installed and enabled.
• Better binding with NiLS Floating Panel service. Solves syncing issues.
All new options affects NiLS Floating Panel too.

• Improved stability when other notifications service are running.
• Added an option to use monochrome icons.
• Improved memory usage.
